1. **Streamline the shopping experience**: Make it easy for your audience to find and purchase eco-friendly products without having to leave the app.
2. **Increase conversions**: By providing a seamless shopping experience, you can increase the chances of your audience making a purchase.
3. **Enhance brand partnerships**: Collaborate with eco-friendly brands and tag their products in your content, which can help drive sales and strengthen your partnership.
4. **Provide value to your audience**: Offer your audience a convenient way to discover and purchase products that align with their values and interests.
